data.name: Hockey Bockey
data.description:
Hockey Bockey is a fluid and fun VR Sport played on a seamless rink with curved boards. Every aspect of the arena is designed to keep the play moving and to allow the players to make spectacular moves and plays with their friends. AI bots are there to insure you never have an empty game, even when you are playing alone!

Features:
- Features 3v3, 2v2, and 1v1 full multiplayer game modes
- Dynamic AI Bots that can pass, shoot and check will make sure you always have a full game 
- AI goalies that keep the ball moving and out of your net 
- Curved arena walls allow for astounding trick passes and moves
- Matches are easy to start and join 
- Practice your moves on a goalie in your private practice rink
- Customize your player, helmet, pads and stick

changelog.change_log:
Hockey Bockey v1.2.8:
  - NEW GAME MODE: Bockey Hockey
  - Remove collision between stick and player feet
  - Updated no bots setting to use HARD goalies

Hockey Bockey v1.2.7:
  - Added 'No Bots' option as a difficulty setting to turn off goalies and bots
  - Minor goalie adjustments

Hockey Bockey v1.2.6:
  - Minor fixes and goalie adjustments

Hockey Bockey v1.2.5:
  - Fixed active games lists not refreshing properly. This should solve a lot of online confusion when looking for open games.
  - Fixed idle players not getting kicked from match
  - Goalie fixes to goalies getting stuck out of position
  - Spring trees

Hockey Bockey v1.2.4:
  - Add game version to online matches to resolve network incompatibilities
  - Users will have to be on the same version to play together

Hockey Bockey v1.2.3:
  - More Spring content updates
  - Pad goalie adjustments
  - Fixed goalies sometimes shooting on their own goals
  - AI adjustments  
  - Made push collision direction more clear in UI
  - Added variation to faceoff ball
  - Added ball speed indicator
  - 3v3 modes capped at 72 fps for more consistent framerate

Hockey Bockey v1.2.2:
  - Minor bot tweaks
  - Fixed bug where Quick Play could join locked match

Hockey Bockey v1.2.1:
  - More bot tweaks and fixes
  - Increased refresh rate from 72 to 90hz

Hockey Bockey v1.2.0:
  - Updated gear
  - Added pro goalies
  - Tweaked bots and difficulties

Hockey Bockey v1.12:
  - Fall content update
  - New gear
  - Better bot passing behavior
  - Visual tweaks
  - Goal sirens
  - Minor fixes

Hockey Bockey v1.11:
  - Added Quick Play button to join any available match or start a public one if none are found
  - Adjust replay camera
  - Minor fixes
